attributes.action: announce the resignation of his government and himself following their actions, which undermine the ethics and morals of our society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to announce the resignation of his government and himself, following the discovery of their plan to release unfounded claims against other individuals (specifically members of the opposition party) into the public domain, which undermines and opposes all morals, ethics and respect that underpins our society and is expected of every member. Furthermore such actions coming from the people who are suppose to lead us and set our examples is only contributing to our degrading social standards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
